post_text: Belen Lopez, a long-time employee at Crockett School, passed away Saturday, December 14. Belen worked at Crockett from 1972 to 2000 and in those 28 years, she coached soccer, volleyball and track, and worked as the cashier in the school cafeteria. Her love for her community and all the children at Crockett, including her three children, was undeniable. She was an advocate for children and Crockett, impacting many students lives by her love, her coaching of life skills, and empowerment through hard work and being part of a team. She will be greatly missed.
